Calculate Rt for Individual Pathogen

Source: R/Rt.R
calc_rt_individual.Rd

Computes reproduction number for a specific pathogen using generation interval convolution

Usage

calc_rt_individual(
  a,
  time_idx,
  pathogen_idx,
  post,
  components,
  tau_max,
  gi_dist,
  g_a
)

Arguments

a

Array of log-incidence posterior samples [samples, pathogens, time]

time_idx

Integer time index

pathogen_idx

Integer pathogen index

post

Posterior samples object (unused but required for interface consistency)

components

Model components (unused but required for interface consistency)

tau_max

Integer maximum generation interval (days)

gi_dist

Function returning generation interval probability for given day

g_a

Numeric normalization constant (sum of generation interval)

Value

Vector of Rt posterior samples

On this page
